metadata.title: ReSight - Gaming Utility for Crosshair Overlays & Display Settings
metadata.description: ReSight is a gaming utility for crosshair overlays, display settings, Discord volume control, and gaming profiles. Enhance your gaming experience with powerful customization tools.

hero.subtitle: Custom crosshair overlays, display adjustments for dark and bright maps, and Discord volume control. All in one app.

features.title: Features
features.subtitle: Everything runs in real-time. No alt-tabbing. No restarting.

crosshair.title: Crosshair Overlay
crosshair.description: Custom crosshairs that work in any game. Pixel-perfect precision with colors, sizes, and styles you control.

visual.title: Visual Clarity
visual.description: Dark maps too dark? Bright skies washing out enemies? Adjust brightness, contrast & gamma instantly with hotkeys.

discord.title: Discord Volume Control
discord.description: Lower voice chat volume with a hotkey during clutch moments. Focus when it matters most.

profiles.title: Game Profiles
profiles.description: Auto-apply your settings when games launch. Different presets for different maps or lighting conditions.

pricing.title: Simple Pricing
pricing.subtitle: One-time purchase. Lifetime access. No subscriptions or hidden fees.
pricing.disclaimer: ReSight is designed to enhance your gaming experience through improved visual clarity and convenience features. We believe in fair play—this tool is not intended to provide unfair advantages. Please use responsibly and in accordance with each game's terms of service. We are not liable for any consequences resulting from use.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Got questions? We've got answers. Find what you need below.

games.question: What games does ReSight work with?
games.answer: ReSight works with virtually any game. The crosshair overlay sits on top of your screen, so it's compatible with all games regardless of whether they have built-in crosshair options.

anticheat.question: Is ReSight safe to use with anti-cheat?
anticheat.answer: ReSight is a screen overlay application that doesn't inject into games or modify game files. However, always check your game's terms of service as policies vary between games and anti-cheat systems.

computers.question: Can I use ReSight on multiple computers?
computers.answer: Each license is activated on one machine. If you need to move your license to a new computer, you can contact support to have your activation reset. For support questions, you can also message the admins in our Discord.

discordVolume.question: How does Discord volume control work?
discordVolume.answer: Press a hotkey to instantly lower your teammates' voice chat volume during intense moments. Press again to restore it. Great for clutch situations where you need to focus.

offline.question: Do I need to be online to use ReSight?
offline.answer: After initial activation, ReSight works completely offline. No internet connection is required for day-to-day use.

cost.question: How much does ReSight cost?
cost.answer: ReSight is a one-time purchase of $4.30 USD. This includes lifetime access to all features, unlimited updates, and priority support. No subscriptions or hidden fees.

displaySettings.question: What display settings can I adjust with ReSight?
displaySettings.answer: ReSight allows you to adjust brightness, contrast, and gamma in real-time using hotkeys. This is especially useful for dark maps in games like Hunt: Showdown or bright environments in other games.
